catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Miscellany
author: Ezobi, Jehoseph ben Hanan ben Nathan
description: Contents: Shem Tov ben Joseph Falaquera, Poems (ff. 1v-17v). Judah ben Isaac ibn Shabbetai, Minḥat Yehudah śoneh ha-nashim (ff. 19r-52v). Judah ben Isaac ibn Shabbetai, Divre ha-eloah ṿeha-niduy (ff. 53r-64r). Jedaiah ben Abraham Bedersi, Ketav ha-hitnatslut (ff. 65r-117v). Jedaiah ben Abraham Bedersi, Igeret beḥinat ha-ʿolam (ff. 118r-136v). Jehoseph ben Hanan ben Nathan Ezobi, Ḳaʿarat kesef (ff. 137r-140r).
